slide.example:
<?php
  function configure_event($area, $event)
  {
      global  $pixmap; 

      $new_pixmap = &new GdkPixmap($event->window,
                                   $event->width,
                                   $event->height,
                                   -1);
      if ($pixmap) {
          $new_pixmap->copy_area($area->style->white_gc, 0, 0, $pixmap, 0, 0,
                                 min($pixmap->width, $new_pixmap->width),
                                 min($pixmap->height, $new_pixmap->height));
      }
      $pixmap = $new_pixmap;
  }
?>
